cleaned_text: of India (Padma Shri for Homeopathy)| Best Selling Author Homeopathy is perhaps one of the only systems of medicines that boost immunity and promotes healing from within. My recent interaction with [News18 India](https://in.linkedin.com/company/news18india?trk=public_post-text) for World Homeopathy Day sheds light on the importance of a strong immune system and the medicines that boost it. Do give it a read and let me know your thoughts in the comments
